extension.name: Link Preview
extension.description: Offers a field that will place a link to the frontend in the publish pages

releases.release: - Added preview button to actions bar
- Added Compatibility with "Association Field" - Allow ID-qualifier for associated entries

- Added setting "anchor label" (displayed in the entries table and entry heading) - Anchor label can also use the {$param} syntax. - Added setting "display url" (display url in entries table instead of the anchor label) - Made entry id accessible for url formatting via {$system:id} - Added {$system:root}, {$system:workspace}, {$system:http-host} parameters
- Added the ability to qualify fields in order to use their value instead of the handle
